DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability IC83/LY2603618 treatment cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability IC83/LY2603618 Administered After Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 Every 21 Days Patients With Cancer
DOC.criteria: Has least one lesion evaluate RECIST Has fully recover toxicity due following : Has life expectancy least 3 month . Negative serum pregnancy test . Is pregnant breastfeeding . Is woman childbearing potential unwilling use approve , effective mean contraception accord institution 's standard . Is man childbearing potential unwilling use approve , effective mean contraception accord institution 's standard . Has history brain metastasis , unless adequately treat without radiologic evidence progressive disease least 3 month completion therapy . Has know active infection .
